May will be massive, when CSR2 releases its biggest update yet. Buckle up and race ahead with new features, cars and modes:

ELITE CREW BATTLE - CHAPTER 3:
The TEMPE5T series is back - challenge Rico Rose and his crew in a dramatic campaign; get a free Mazda MX-5 Miata, unlock five brand new cars and a new Elite License.

You thought we were done - too soon Junior! Two more legendary Fast & Furious cars – the Veilside Mazda RX-7 and Mitsubishi Eclipse - are up for grabs in two special events, continuing the race wars plotline.

Turn challengers to dust, when the Fast & Furious event line comes to an explosive end in CSR2 in this hot summer release:

FAST & FURIOUS - FINALE
The Fast & Furious crew is back in CSR2 one last time with the iconic cars and characters from the world’s most popular drag-racing franchise. The finale event will test your skills as you need to bring the top 5 fan favorite cars from the franchise to the starting line to complete a 100-race storyline to battle it out for the iconic 1970 Dodge Charger R/T.

2ND ANNIVERSARY
The #1 Mobile Racing Game celebrates its 2nd anniversary - reason enough for us to thank our community on the birthday with a great present. Join the Anniversary Cup to get your exclusive Anniversary Dodge Snakeskin Viper ACR

MADE IN AMERICA

- Bentley Continental GT
- 1970 Dodge Charger R/T
- Dodge Viper Snakeskin Edition GTC
- Ford Mustang HPE750
- Hennessey Venom GT Spyder "Final Edition"
- KTM X-BOW R
- Plymouth Barracuda "TorC" Weaver Customs Independence Day Edition

Make sure to follow us on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram for more info on the update. See you on the race track!
